name: BoxStrike
description:
Box Strike is a game made as a final work for a course in game programming using Unreal Engine.

The game consists in taking the box to the opposite wall evading hitting yours with it. To do so the player has a weapon to shoot two types of shots and some extra elements in the levels.

There is also a robot that impulses the box to take it to your wall or evade hitting its wall, this impulses grow stronger when it approaches the box.
